info.description: The Open-Source AI Control Plane - See Everything. Control Everything. Observability, routing, and governance for AI.
info.title: Brokle AI Control Plane API

get.description: Get a paginated list of blacklisted tokens with filtering options

parameters.description: Number of tokens to return (default: 50, max: 200)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Immediately revoke a specific access token by JTI

get.description: Get comprehensive statistics about token usage and revocation

post.description: Immediately revoke all active access tokens for a specific user

get.description: Get detailed cost analytics including trends, breakdowns by provider/model, and optimization suggestions
Get performance and usage analytics for AI models including quality scores and cost efficiency
Get high-level analytics overview including total requests, costs, and performance metrics
Get performance analytics for AI providers including latency, success rates, and health scores
Get detailed analytics about AI requests including patterns, providers, models, and success rates

post.description: Change user password with current password verification. REQUIRES X-CSRF-Token header matching csrf_token cookie value (double-submit CSRF protection).

400.description: Invalid request or wrong current password

403.description: CSRF validation failed - token missing or mismatch

post.description: Complete OAuth-based registration with additional user information
Exchange OAuth login session for access tokens (existing user OAuth login)
Initiate password reset process by sending reset email

200.description: Reset email sent if account exists

get.description: Start GitHub OAuth authentication flow
Handle GitHub OAuth callback and create session
Start Google OAuth authentication flow
Handle Google OAuth callback and create session

post.description: Authenticate user. Sets httpOnly cookies: access_token (15min), refresh_token (7days), csrf_token (15min). Returns user data + expiry metadata (milliseconds).

200.description: Cookies set. Response: { user, expires_at(ms), expires_in(ms) }

post.description: Logout user, invalidate session, clear httpOnly cookies. REQUIRES X-CSRF-Token header matching csrf_token cookie value (double-submit CSRF protection).

403.description: CSRF validation failed - token missing or mismatch

get.description: Get current user with token expiry metadata. Requires access_token cookie for authentication.

post.description: Refresh tokens using refresh_token from httpOnly cookie. Returns new cookies with rotated tokens + expiry metadata (milliseconds).

200.description: New cookies set. Response: { expires_at(ms), expires_in(ms) }

401.description: Refresh token missing, invalid, or expired. Cookies cleared.

post.description: Complete password reset using token from email

400.description: Invalid request payload or expired token

get.description: Get paginated list of user sessions with device info

post.description: Revoke all user sessions (logout from all devices). This will invalidate ALL active sessions for the user.

parameters.description: Request body (currently unused but kept for future extensibility)
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get details of a specific user session

post.description: Revoke a specific user session (logout from specific device)
Register new user with organization or invitation. Sets httpOnly cookies: access_token (15min), refresh_token (7days), csrf_token (15min). Returns user data + expiry metadata (milliseconds).

200.description: Cookies set. Response: { user, expires_at(ms), expires_in(ms) }

get.description: Get a paginated list of invoices for an organization

200.description: List of organization invoices with cursor pagination

400.description: Bad request - invalid organization ID or parameters

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view billing information

get.description: Get current subscription details for an organization

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view billing information

post.description: Update subscription plan, add-ons, or payment method for an organization

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or subscription update not allowed

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to modify billing information

422.description: Unprocessable entity - payment method declined or plan change not allowed

get.description: Get detailed usage metrics and billing information for an organization

400.description: Bad request - invalid organization ID or parameters

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view billing information

get.description: Validate an invitation token and return invitation details
Initiate an export job for AI request logs in various formats (JSON, CSV, Excel)

400.description: Bad request - invalid parameters or date range too large

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions or export quota exceeded

422.description: Unprocessable entity - date range exceeds maximum allowed

get.description: Get a paginated list of AI requests with filtering and search capabilities
Get comprehensive details about a specific AI request including full execution trace

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view this request

get.description: Get a paginated list of organizations for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Search organizations by name or slug
parameters.name: search

200.description: List of organizations with cursor pagination

post.description: Create a new organization. The authenticated user becomes the organization owner.

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific organization

delete.description: Permanently delete an organization. Only organization owners can delete organizations. This action cannot be undone.

403.description: Forbidden - only organization owners can delete organizations

409.description: Conflict - cannot delete organization with active projects or subscriptions

patch.description: Partially update organization details. Only owners and admins can update organization settings.

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions (requires owner or admin role)

get.description: Get a list of all members in an organization, including their roles and status

200.description: List of organization members with cursor pagination

400.description: Bad request - invalid organization ID or query parameters

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view members

post.description: Send an invitation to join the organization. Only owners and admins can invite new members.

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions (requires owner or admin role)

409.description: Conflict - user is already a member or has pending invitation

delete.description: Remove a member from the organization or revoke their invitation. Owners and admins can remove members.

400.description: Bad request - invalid organization ID or user ID

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions or cannot remove organization owner

get.description: Get all settings for an organization as key-value pairs

post.description: Create a new setting for an organization

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

post.description: Create multiple settings for an organization in a single request

get.description: Export all settings for an organization

post.description: Import settings for an organization, creating or updating as needed
Reset all organization settings to default values (removes all current settings)

get.description: Get a specific setting by key for an organization

put.description: Update an existing setting for an organization

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

delete.description: Delete a setting for an organization

post.description: Executes a prompt template with variables. Optionally updates session's last_run if session_id provided.
Streams prompt execution results via SSE. Optionally updates session's last_run if session_id provided.

get.description: Get a paginated list of projects accessible to the authenticated user. Optionally filter by organization.

parameters.description: Search projects by name or slug
parameters.name: search

200.description: List of projects with cursor pagination

post.description: Create a new project within an organization. User must have appropriate permissions in the organization.

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

409.description: Conflict - project slug already exists in organization

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific project

put.description: Update project details. Requires appropriate permissions within the project organization.

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

delete.description: Permanently delete a project and all associated environments and data. This action cannot be undone.

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions (requires admin or owner role)

409.description: Conflict - cannot delete project with active environments or API usage

get.description: Get a paginated list of API keys for a specific project. Keys are shown with preview format (bk_xxxx...yyyy) for security.

200.description: List of project-scoped API keys with cursor pagination

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to view API keys

post.description: Create a new industry-standard API key for the project. The full key will only be displayed once upon creation. Format: bk_{40_char_random}

201.description: Project-scoped API key created successfully (full key only shown once)

400.description: Bad request - invalid input or validation errors

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to create API keys

409.description: Conflict - API key name already exists in project

delete.description: Permanently revoke and delete a project-scoped API key. This action cannot be undone and will immediately invalidate the key across all environments.

400.description: Bad request - invalid project ID or key ID

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to delete API keys

404.description: Project or API key not found

post.description: Archive a project (sets status to archived, read-only, reversible)

get.description: Returns all configured AI provider credentials for the project (with masked keys).

post.description: Creates a new credential configuration. Each configuration has a unique name within the project.

get.description: Returns LLM models available based on configured AI providers. Standard providers return default models plus any custom models. Custom providers return only user-defined models.

post.description: Tests the provided API key and configuration without saving. Returns success or error message.

get.description: Returns the credential configuration for a specific credential ID (with masked key).

delete.description: Removes a credential configuration by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing credential configuration by ID. Name can be changed if unique.

get.description: Returns all datasets for the project.

post.description: Creates a new dataset for the project. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

get.description: Returns the dataset for a specific ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

put.description: Updates an existing dataset by ID.

delete.description: Removes a dataset by its ID. Also deletes all items in the dataset.

get.description: Returns items for a dataset with pagination.

post.description: Creates a new item in the dataset.

delete.description: Removes an item from the dataset.

get.description: Returns all experiments for the project.

parameters.description: Filter by status (pending, running, completed, failed)
parameters.name: status

post.description: Creates a new experiment for the project. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

get.description: Returns the experiment for a specific ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

put.description: Updates an existing experiment by ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

delete.description: Removes an experiment by its ID. Also deletes all items in the experiment.

get.description: Returns items for an experiment with pagination.
Lists all playground sessions for the sidebar.

parameters.description: Maximum number of sessions to return (default 20, max 100)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Creates a new playground session with name and windows.

get.description: Retrieves a playground session by its ID.

put.description: Updates a session's name, description, tags, variables, config, or windows.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of prompts with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new prompt with initial version

get.description: Retrieve the list of protected labels for a project

put.description: Update the list of protected labels for a project

get.description: Retrieve prompt details with latest version

put.description: Update prompt name, description, or tags (not template)

delete.description: Soft delete a prompt and all its versions

get.description: Get the diff between two versions of a prompt
Retrieve all versions of a prompt

post.description: Create a new version of a prompt

get.description: Retrieve a specific version of a prompt

patch.description: Add or update labels pointing to a specific version

get.description: Returns all score configurations for the project.

post.description: Creates a new score configuration for the project. Score configs define validation rules for scores.

get.description: Returns the score configuration for a specific config ID.

put.description: Updates an existing score configuration by ID.

delete.description: Removes a score configuration by its ID.

post.description: Unarchive a project (sets status back to active)

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of quality scores

parameters.description: Filter by source (API, AUTO, HUMAN, EVAL)
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Filter by data type (NUMERIC, CATEGORICAL, BOOLEAN)
parameters.name: data_type

get.description: Retrieve detailed score information

put.description: Update an existing score (for corrections/enrichment after initial creation)

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of spans
Retrieve detailed span information

delete.description: Delete a span by its OTEL span_id

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of traces with optional filtering

parameters.description: Filter by service name (OTLP resource attribute)
parameters.name: service_name

parameters.description: Filter by AI model name (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus)
parameters.name: model_name

parameters.description: Filter by provider name (e.g., openai, anthropic)
parameters.name: provider_name

get.description: Retrieve available filter values from actual trace data for populating filter UI
get.summary: Get available filter options for traces

get.description: Retrieve detailed trace information (aggregated from spans)

delete.description: Delete all spans belonging to a trace

get.description: Retrieve trace with all associated quality scores
Retrieve trace with all spans in hierarchical structure
Get the profile information of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile information of the currently authenticated user
Set the default organization for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Organization ID to set as default
parameters.name: request

400.description: Invalid request body or organization ID

403.description: User is not a member of the organization

get.description: Get basic health status of the service
Check if service is alive and responsive
Check if service and all dependencies are ready to handle requests

200.description: Service and all dependencies are ready

503.description: Service or dependencies are not ready

get.description: Retrieve Prometheus-compatible metrics for monitoring and observability

post.description: Validates a self-contained API key and extracts project information automatically

401.description: Invalid, inactive, or expired API key

post.description: Creates a new dataset for the project. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

get.description: Returns the dataset for a specific ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.
Returns items for a dataset with pagination using API key authentication.

post.description: Creates multiple items in a dataset using API key authentication.
post.summary: Batch create dataset items via SDK

post.description: Creates a new experiment for the project. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

get.description: Returns the experiment for a specific ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

patch.description: Updates an existing experiment by ID. Works for both SDK and Dashboard routes.

post.description: Creates multiple items for an experiment using API key authentication.
post.summary: Batch create experiment items via SDK

post.description: Accepts OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) logs in JSON or Protobuf format
post.summary: OTLP logs ingestion endpoint (OpenTelemetry spec compliant)

post.description: Accepts OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) metrics in JSON or Protobuf format
post.summary: OTLP metrics ingestion endpoint (OpenTelemetry spec compliant)

get.description: Retrieve a list of prompts for the project

post.description: Creates a new prompt or adds a new version if prompt already exists

get.description: Retrieve a prompt by name with optional label or version specification

parameters.description: Specific version number (takes precedence over label)
parameters.name: version

post.description: Creates a score for a trace/span. If a ScoreConfig exists for the score name, validates against it.
Creates multiple scores in a single request. If ScoreConfigs exist, validates against them.
Accepts OpenTelemetry Protocol (OTLP) traces in JSON or Protobuf format
post.summary: OTLP trace ingestion endpoint (OpenTelemetry spec compliant)

get.description: Upgrade HTTP connection to WebSocket for real-time updates and notifications

admin.RevokeTokenRequest.description: Request to revoke a specific access token

admin.RevokeUserTokensRequest.description: Request to revoke all access tokens for a user

credential_id.description: credential ID when multiple configs exist

description.example: Switch from gpt-4 to gpt-3.5-turbo for 70% of requests

auth.CompleteOAuthSignupRequest.description: Complete OAuth signup with additional user information

message.example: Monthly cost has reached 80% of limit

headers.description: Pointer allows clearing with empty map

health.HealthResponse.description: Health check response containing service status

spanId.description: Linked span ID (Buffer or hex string)

traceId.description: Linked trace ID (Buffer or hex string)

data.description: Can be Gauge, Sum, Histogram, etc.

model_name.description: Materialized columns (db:"-" = computed by ClickHouse, not stored)

credential_id.description: Specific credential config ID (optional, falls back to adapter-based lookup)

provider.description: Adapter type (openai, anthropic, azure, gemini, openrouter, custom)

version_id.description: ULID of the specific version (for linking)

response.APIError.description: Error details for failed API requests

response.Meta.description: Response metadata including request tracking and offset pagination

response.Pagination.description: Offset-based pagination information for list responses

user.UserProfileData.description: Extended user profile data including bio, location, and social links

user.UserProfileResponse.description: Complete user profile information including basic info and extended profile

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key authentication for AI gateway and SDKs. Format: Authorization: Bearer bk_live_... OR X-API-Key: bk_live_... (both supported for flexibility)
ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization

CSRFToken.description: CSRF protection for mutations (POST/PUT/PATCH/DELETE). Value must match csrf_token cookie. Required for all non-idempotent operations.
CSRFToken.name: X-CSRF-Token

CookieAuth.description: Cookie-based JWT authentication. Login/Signup set httpOnly cookies (access_token, refresh_token, csrf_token). Browser sends automatically. Testing: Use browser DevTools/Postman/cURL (Swagger UI cannot test cookies).
CookieAuth.name: Cookie
